summary: Fixes the problem with NVIDIA OPTIMUS and \"d3d9.dll\" mods - ENB, SweetFX, FXAA, SMAA, DynaVision, etc.
descriptionHtml:
********************************************************************************************************************************
** FIXES PROBLEMS WITH NVIDIA OPTIMUS - ALLOWS ADDING POST-EFFECTS AND OTHER D3D9.DLL MODS **
********************************************************************************************************************************

********************************************************************
** WORKS FOR ALL DX9 GAMES, NOT JUST FOR SKYRIM **
********************************************************************

This adapter DLL, originally created for Skyrim users, is actually working for all DirectX 9 games. It is needed for those who want to use custom d3d9.dll (SweetFX, FXAA, SMAA, Dynavision, ENB or others) on systems with NVidia\'s Optimus technology. This custom d3d9.dll is sometimes called proxy or wrapper DLL.
author: HiAlgoBoost
